name: Phantasy Star Portable
description:
Phantasy Star Portable is an action-RPG game developed by Sonic Team and Alfa System. It came out on 31-07-2008. SEGA published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
You can play Phantasy Star Portable on PSP. The game is sold via PlayStation Store.
Satoshi Sakai and Tetsuya Sasaki produced the game. It was directed by Tatsuya Nagata. It was scored by Hideaki Kobayashi, Kenichi Tokoi and Taihei Sato.
